identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a 'Toxic Protocol' aesthetic that feels like a powerful, stealthy hacker tool. No generic SaaS vibes.

headings.usage: All headings (h1-h6), stats, and data displays.

glows.usage: Primary Buttons, Active States, Success Indicators

bubbles.description: Animated glowing green orbs floating in the background.
bubbles.implementation: Use framer-motion to animate absolute positioned divs with blur-3xl and low opacity (10-20%).

buttons.primary: bg-neon text-black font-bold hover:shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(0,255,65,0.4)] hover:scale-105 transition-all duration-200 rounded-none skew-x-[-10deg]
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-neon/50 text-neon hover:bg-neon/10 rounded-none skew-x-[-10deg]

cards.base: bg-card/50 backdrop-blur-md border border-white/5 rounded-xl overflow-hidden hover:border-neon/30 transition-colors

inputs.base: bg-black/50 border-white/10 focus:border-neon focus:ring-1 focus:ring-neon/50 placeholder:text-gray-600 text-white rounded-md

backgrounds.description: Dark matrix code background for login or hero sections (use with heavy overlay)

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Install 'lucide-react' for icons and 'framer-motion' for the bubble animations.
2. THEME: Update 'tailwind.config.js' and 'index.css' immediately to use the 'Toxic Protocol' color palette. Force DARK MODE by default.
3. BUBBLES: Create a 'BackgroundBubbles' component using framer-motion. It should have 5-10 large, blurred green circles moving slowly in the background. Z-index -1.
4. LAYOUT: Build the 'DashboardLayout' with a fixed glassmorphism sidebar and a top bar. The main content area should have the 'Control Room' grid.
5. COMPONENTS: Customize all Shadcn components (Buttons, Cards, Inputs) to match the 'Toxic Protocol' (Green/Black, sharp edges, glows).
6. FONTS: Import 'JetBrains Mono' and 'Inter' from Google Fonts in 'index.css'.
7. TESTING: Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, links).
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for the main background, use solid #050505.
Use 'text-neon' (green) for primary actions and active states.
Ensure all text has sufficient contrast against the dark background.
Use 'sonner' for notifications (styled with black bg and green border).
Never use default blue colors. Replace all blues with Green or Dark Grey.
